content: What 1993 film features a dinosaur theme park and is based on a novel by Michael Crichton?

The film you're referring to is "Jurassic Park." It was released in 1993 and is based on the novel of the same name by Michael Crichton. The movie, directed by Steven Spielberg, tells the story of a group of scientists and visitors who are stranded on an island after dinosaurs created from prehistoric DNA begin to rebel against their creators. "Jurassic Park" was a groundbreaking film in terms of its special effects and storytelling, and it remains a classic in the science fiction genre.
